description: A mid-engine masterpiece built by engineers who worship at the altar of balance. The Apex Circuit has a naturally aspirated V6 mounted behind the driver, aluminum everything, and the kind of telepathic handling that makes professional drivers weep with joy.
lore: Zenith's flagship was hand-built by a team of 200 in a dedicated facility. Each engine was assembled by a single technician who signed the valve cover. The Apex Circuit doesn't have the most power in Tier 3, but its mid-engine layout and aluminum construction make it the benchmark for balance. The car that other cars are measured against.
